snippet: A musical twist of Shakespeare’s “The Winter’s Tale,” presented in Central Park by the Public Theater, spritzes the post-summer air with an invigorating sense of excitement and discovery.
abstract: Charles Isherwood reviews Public Theater's musical adaptation of Shakespeare's The Winter's Tale, conceived and directed by Lear deBessonet and starring Todd Almond at Delacorte Theater in Central Park.
lead_paragraph: A musical twist of Shakespeare’s “The Winter’s Tale,” presented in Central Park by the Public Theater, spritzes the post-summer air with an invigorating sense of excitement and discovery.

headline.seo: A Musical ‘Winter’s Tale’ Breezes Through Central Park
headline.main: With Fur and Song, Transforming the Tragic
headline.print_headline: With Fur and Song, Transforming the Tragic
